name: create-envfile-extension-azdevops
description: A task to create an .env file based on a variable group in Azure DevOps. This extension simplifies the process of generating environment files for your projects.

scripts.pack: azde-scripts build src && azde-scripts package src && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file config/release.json
scripts.packupversion: azde-scripts build src && azde-scripts package src && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version --overrides-file config/release.json
scripts.pack:dev: azde-scripts build src && azde-scripts package src && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file config/dev.json
scripts.packupversion:dev: azde-scripts build src && azde-scripts package src && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --rev-version --overrides-file config/dev.json
